author: Flo (tonebytone)
content:
Just reading about all the space inside your new bag made me feel exhausted! Andreas, I thought that the whole shift in your focus, pardon the pun, this year has been to go lighter and lighter!

I don't take a bag any more, even a little one. Because whatever carrying space I have access to inevitably gets filled - and therefore, heavier!

BTW, I love your little froggie. Takes me waaaay back to my kiddie days when I loved playing in the snow!
